summary: Comprehensive testing of football jersey cataloging web app completed. Backend APIs working perfectly (11/11 - 100% success). Frontend functionality largely working with authentication flow, navigation, filtering, and CRUD operations successful. One minor routing issue identified with protected collection page.

integration_issues.flow: My Collection page access via direct URL
integration_issues.issue: Collection page redirects to landing page when accessed directly with session cookie
integration_issues.workaround: Collection functionality works via API and when navigating through the app

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero, stats (24 kits, 36 versions, 3 users, 2 reviews), and features
Browse page loads with 24 seeded jerseys in grid view
Filter functionality - club filter works correctly
Grid/List view toggle works on browse page
Kit detail page loads with proper navigation and versions list
Version detail page loads from kit detail with complete information
Authentication flow - session creation and /api/auth/me endpoint working
Add to Collection CRUD - successfully added item to collection via frontend
Review creation - 4-star review with comment submitted successfully
All backend API endpoints working (11/11): stats, seed, filters, kits, versions, auth, collections, reviews
Seed data API returns 24 kits and 36 versions
Filters API returns clubs and brands data
Protected routes properly hide auth-required elements when not authenticated
Add Jersey form loads and accepts input for authenticated users

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (1 minor routing issue out of extensive testing)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix protected route redirection issue: Collection page (/collection) redirects to landing page when accessed directly with session cookie. The underlying collection functionality works perfectly via API, but frontend routing needs investigation.
